text: Iggy Strange Dahl is a songwriter based in Stockholm, Sweden. Iggy has written songs for major recording artists like September, Lena Katina (Former member of t.A.T.u.), Sweetbox, F(x), Arashi, Jolin Tsai,http://www.musicdish.com/mag/index.php3?id=13369 Super Junior Donghae & Eunhyuk, Elliott Murphy and he has had more than twenty No. 1 hits on official music charts in Japan, Korea, Taiwan, Indonesia, China and Sweden. In 2010 he co-wrote the song "Manipulated" for the Swedish entry to Eurovision Song Contest (Melodifestivalen) performed by Hanna Lindblad.http://www.aftonbladet.se/nyheter/article12158512.ab In Melodifestivalen 2015 he competed again, this time performing with the band JTR and the song "Building It Up", which reached the final.http://www.svt.se/melodifestivalen/artister/2015/jtr-building-it-up Together with Erik Lewander and Olle Ljungman he has composed music for the Swedish TV-serie "Jordskott".http://www.svt.se/jordskott/ ==Tracklist / Releases== * 2016: Soulvibe - "Fire To The Floor” single from the forthcoming album (Indonesia) * 2016: Sezairi - "Fire To The Floor” single from
